attributes.action: The Government to pay for the funerals of all military veterans.
attributes.additional_details:
This policy would cost relatively little as our armed forces generally have not been large. The cost would be a small price to pay as all service personnel put their lives in danger to protect this country. It would also be a final recognition of their contribution to our society and to say a lasting thank you to them and their families and friends. 
If you agree with the above please sign this petition.
attributes.background: For the benefit of all military veterans who have served in HM Armed Forces for over two years irrespective of their personal finances. Proposed is a £5000 limit per funeral to be claimed from the Ministry of Defence by the family or representatives of the deceased within two months of death.
